item.description:
Experience High Vibrational Living with Imani! Raw Food Demo and Q & A @ the Alchemy Café.
Classes starts at 7:30pm. Cost $15 per person, please call to reserve your spot 860.246.5700.
We will dialog about the challenges and how-to's of sustainable living - starting with food!

Sept 9th
Green Smoothies & Juices - easy steps to introducing more raw foods into your daily food routine
GREAT Way to start a DETOX!

Sept 16th
Passionate About Pates – come learn how to make simple & fulfilling hummus & walnut pate – overview of the importance and how-to of sprouting nuts & seeds

Sept 30th
Dehydrator Basics- Imani will share her very popular & secret recipe for Kale Chips & Flax Crax. We will share tips to make your dehydration attempts a smashing success!

October 7th
Fermented Veggies – Live fermented foods are ENZYME RICH and essential for your health. Discover how to ferment things right from your garden! It’s easy! Come learn HOW! We will also discuss the overlapping concepts of raw food and author Sally Fallon!
item.name: RAW FOOD DEMO: Green Smoothies & Juices
